analysis.description:
Salvageable.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_contracts/0x18ff9965720191b169a7b268974533a8fbbd0113.sol#461-472) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-oddToken.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x18ff9965720191b169a7b268974533a8fbbd0113.sol#469-472)
